    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public static CloverAuth.AuthResult authenticate(android.app.Activity activity,
                                                 android.accounts.Account account,
                                                 boolean forceValidateToken)
                                          throws android.accounts.OperationCanceledException,
                                                 android.accounts.AuthenticatorException,
                                                 java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. Use authenticate(Activity, Account, boolean, Long, TimeUnit) and gracefully handle OperationCanceledException.
        Authenticates with the Clover service. This method makes a network call to the Clover service. It should be run on a background thread.

        This method will block indefinitely for a result.

        Throws:
        android.accounts.OperationCanceledException
        android.accounts.AuthenticatorException
        java.io.IOException

      • authenticate

        public static CloverAuth.AuthResult authenticate(android.app.Activity activity,
                                                 android.accounts.Account account,
                                                 boolean forceValidateToken,
                                                 java.lang.Long timeout,
                                                 java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
                                          throws android.accounts.OperationCanceledException,
                                                 android.accounts.AuthenticatorException,
                                                 java.io.IOException
        Authenticates with the Clover service. This method makes a network call to the Clover service. It should be run on a background thread.
        Parameters:
        activity - the activity that initiated the authentication
        account - the account used for authentication
        forceValidateToken - flag for if token should be validated against API. Increases response latency, use only when necessary.
        timeout - the maximum time to wait
        unit - the time unit of the timeout argument. This must not be null.
        Throws:
        android.accounts.OperationCanceledException
        android.accounts.AuthenticatorException
        java.io.IOException

      • authenticate

        android.accounts.AuthenticatorException
